name: Captain Fly and Sexy Girls at the Night Club
name_original: Captain Fly and Sexy Girls at the Night Club
description:
In this game you control the captain who flies through the night club.
You can pick up food to have energy and not to die,
and poo to activate a super vision that allows you to see naked dancing women.
Try to collect as many points as possible.

What flies love the most? Poo of course!
Gather stinky treasure to recharge Captain’s greatest ability.
Go ahead and inspect every nook and cranny of the night club.
Remember to feed hero with moldy food to refuel his energy and vitality on this exciting journey!

The game is located in the night club for adults.

It is intended only for adult players

Features:

- Flying at the night club
- Dancing Woman
- Full naked Woman
- Super vision of captain fly
- Score attack
- Disco music
